      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeScanner()
      Because this class has an embedded Scanner object, at the end of any method that uses this class we need to call this method to close the scanner

      • doOnceContinueProgram

        public static boolean doOnceContinueProgram(int runTimes,
                                            java.lang.String prompt,
                                            java.lang.String continuance)
        A method that handles the logic for a loop that has to run once before it prompts the user
        Parameters:
        runTimes - - how many times this loop has run, you need to update in the while loop, or this will cause your loop to never ask the user the prompt
        prompt - - String you would like displayed to the user
        continuance - - the String they would need to enter to continue the program
        Returns:

      • continueProgram

        public static boolean continueProgram(java.lang.String prompt,
                                      java.lang.String continuance)
        This method has the logic for continuing a while loop on the users input
        Parameters:
        prompt - - String you would like displayed to the user
        continuance - - the String they would need to enter to continue the program
        Returns:

        public static void closeScanner()
